title: Onion Soup Recipe
directions: In a stock pot over medium heat, melt ghee and thinly sliced onions.
Season with salt and pepper to taste.
Bring mixture to a boil and then reduce the heat and allow to simmer for 30â€“50 minutes (the longer, the more flavor).
ingredients: 4 large onions, peeled and thinly sliced
Sea salt and black pepper to taste
